interval 10
reset 2	
sleep 10
send 0004F10000006EEF
trigger 000A00
reset 0																//set VEN to 1
sleep 100
reset 1																//set VEN to 1
sleep 100
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000101														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 200100															// NCI CORE INIT CMD
send 2F0200															// NCI SYSTEM ACT PROPRIETARY EXT
send 2F000101														// ENABLE STANDBY MODE
send 20020F01A00E0B110101310000001000800C							// Config 1
send 20021B03A0030100A020088851E302B821E102A026088801E202F000A201	// PLL used
send 20020C01A020088851E302B821E102									// Clock 19.2 MHz
send 20020C01A026088801E202F000A201									// Clock 19.2 MHz
send 20020C01A0EB08FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
send 20020801A03804050B0B00
send  //DLMA disable
send 20025C01A00B58109090780F4E32003D9F00003D9F0000509F0000599F00005A9F0000649F0000659F00006E9F0000729F0000799F00007B9F0000849F0000869F00008F9F0000919F00009A9F0000A19F0000A71F0000B01F0000B91F0000 												// DPC disable
send 20020D03A0ED0101A0EC0100A0D40100								// Enable ESE, Disable UICC1, Disable UICC2
send 20000100														// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 200100															// NCI CORE INIT CMD
send 20030301A0EB
send 220302C003
send 22000101														// Discovery command
send 200406030101020101
send 0300028103
send 030004810103C0
send 2201020101
send 030003818001
trigger 0300078112C041014116
send 0300028180
send 030003968000
send 030003810204
send 220102C001 
send 030005811030C030 
send 0300029903 
send 030007995080CA9F7F00	//get CPLC
check 9000
send 20020401800101
send 21011600040003C001000003C001010003C001020103008105 
send 210303018001
trigger 610904C0 		//wait RF_INTF_ACTIVATED_NTF
end
